src.batchLoader module

class src.batchLoader.BatchLoader(dataset: Dataset, batch_size: int, shuffle: bool = True, include_last_batch: bool = True)[source]

Bases: object

A class for loading batches of data from a dataset.

_dataset

The dataset from which to load data.

Type:

Dataset

_batch_size

The size of each batch.

Type:

int

_shuffle

Whether to shuffle the dataset before loading batches.

Type:

bool

_include_last_batch

Whether to include the last batch if it’s

Type:

bool

smaller than batch_size.

Parameters:

Tuple containing the audio time series and its sampling rate.

If the loading fails, returns (None, None).
